薕字的基本解释

薕
lián
未开花的荻。

薕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lián］
［《廣韻》力鹽切，平鹽，來。］
蒹，荻。

薕字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　薕； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1061第13
【唐韻】力鹽切，音廉。【爾雅·釋草】蒹，薕。【註】似萑而細，高數尺，江東呼爲薕。又【廣志】三薕似箭，羽長三四寸，皮肥細，緗色，以蜜藏之，味甘酸可食。出交州，五月中熟。　又【類篇】薑也。

薕字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
薕字的起名意思

暂无。

[①]［lián］
["Guangyun" cut salt with force, flat salt, come. ]
Cymbal, Di.
Barley
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zhezi] 　薕; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 1061 to 13
[Tang Yun] The salt is cut hard, and the sound is low. 【Erya·Shucao】Cymbal, yam. 【Note】Like a vine but thin, a few feet high, Jiangdong is called 薕. Also [Guangzhi] Three vines are like arrows, feathers are three or four inches long, the skin is thin, and the color is thin, hidden in honey, sweet and sour and edible. Delivered to the state, ripe in mid-May.　[Classes] Jiang Ye.
